description:
Jigoku Unko Toripuru is  Beat Em Up 2D Platform game.

First of all, you should know this!

You must destroy everything that comes your way with ONE PUNCH.

Our character has a tantrum after eating spicy Wasabi.
Then he finds himself in hell for some unknown reason.
He is no longer human and is even more angry.
By breaking all the obstacles in front of him, he tries to advance as far as he can without his anger killing him.

Features:

3 Characters available.
3 Different map biome.
12 Playable chapters of the story.
Extra Endless level to earn high scores.
name: Jigoku Unko Toripuru
